CustomField.formula: IF( OR( INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Finance Staff"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Finance Management"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Firm Management"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Managing Parnter") ), "Finance", IF( OR( INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Risk Staff / Conflicts"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Records"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Risk Leader"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Intake Leader"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "IT Security"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Non-Law Firm Risk Leader") ), "Risk", IF( OR( INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "IT Staff"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "IT Leader"), INCLUDES(Role_old__c, "Integration Leader") ), "IT", "" )))
CustomField.label: Standard Firm Role
